settings.product_feature_description: The frame of The Worksport™ SC3 cover is powder coated lightweight aluminum with strengthening cross members. The frame has precision welded frame connections for the most robust possible construction
The cam latch offers a wide range of adjustability and a handle that tucks away to prevent it from interfering with your cargo.
Durable, All metal 60/63 extruded aluminum clamps, coated in anti-abrasive plastic to protect the connection point from damage and safely securing the cover in position.

Weather tight “Q-Seal” gaskets protect your cargo form water, snow, and other debris. The entire perimeter of the cover is sealed with hard wearing rubber that is designed to last the lifetime of the product.

settings.product_detail_hero_headline: Soft vinyl, four panel cover that provides full bed access with our patented smart latch technology
